meanings.definition: A substance used to make something darker.
meanings.sent1: The darkeners were added to the paint to create a deeper shade.
meanings.sent2: She bought some darkeners to dye her hair black.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the darkeners, turning the room into a shadowy mess.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds acted as natural darkeners, casting a gloomy shadow over the town.
meanings.sent5: The darkeners in the ink made the writing on the paper almost impossible to read.

meanings.definition: People or things that make something darker.
meanings.sent1: The darkeners in the room dimmed the lights for the movie night.
meanings.sent2: The darkeners in the forest made it hard to see the path ahead.
meanings.sent3: The darkeners at the party wore all black, blending into the night.
meanings.sent4: The darkeners in the painting added a mysterious aura to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The darkeners in the sky signaled the approach of a storm.
